channel.title: CVE Feed for baserCMS Users Community -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baserCMS Users Community -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0571|2024-08-05T03:28:11.168Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote attackers with a site operator privilege to upload arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2018-0572|2024-08-05T03:28:11.141Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to view or alter a restricted content via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0573|2024-08-05T03:28:11.145Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote attackers to bypass access restriction for a content to view a file which is uploaded by a site user via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0574|2024-08-05T03:28:11.127Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0569|2024-08-05T03:28:11.186Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0570|2024-08-05T03:28:11.123Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0575|2024-08-05T03:28:11.082Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS (baserCMS 4.1.0.1 and earlier versions, baserCMS 3.0.15 and earlier versions) allows remote attackers to bypass access restriction in mail form to view a file which is uploaded by a site user via unspecified vectors.
